name: Martino Caroli
subtitle: CFO Cluster Italy and Board Member at DB Schenker
about: Accomplished, forward-thinking Chief Financial Officer (CFO) with wide experience and technical know-how in Finance / Accounting / Controlling.Deep knowledge of the forwarding and logistics industry, gained in the last 20 years, with 10+ years spent as CFO of a company which progressed to 1+ billion-eur turnover and 1.500+ employees, with strong Reporting line to the regional CFO Europe.Leading a successful finance team to execute corporate tasks, develop and implement efficient and effective local financial and operational strategies in order to foster profitable growth and value creation.Working closely with the CEO and the senior leadership team of the BUs / FUs to identify opportunities and drive initiatives, providing business and financial insights, offering perspectives.Results driven, used to work in a large international environment and lead multifunctional teams, managing complex financial projects (including transformation). Constant aim to improve efficiency and quality with track record in successful change management and capability building.Broad scope of authority which includes executive guidance for the areas (BU/Investment/Cost) Controlling/Reporting, Accounting, Internal Control/Audit, Credit Management, Core Treasury, Procurement (indirect spent), Real Estate and Facility Management, Legal and Risk Management, Claims and Insurances.
experiences: Member of the Board of Directors
